d: Senya is a slightly weird shirt.

armholeDepthFactor.d: Controls the depth of the armhole. Higher values make a deeper armhole.

backNeckCutout.d: How deep the neck is cut out at the back

bicepTopCoverage.d: How much of the bicep is covered by the sleeves.

chestEase.d: The amount of ease at your chest.

circleRatio.d: The percentage of a circle you want the bottom to be.

lengthBonus.d: Determines how long the skirt will be.

lowerWaistline.d: How much below the waistline the connection between the top and bottom part of the shirt is.

necklineBend.d: Controls the curvature of the neckline.

necklineDepth.d: Controls how deep the neck opening plunges down.

necklineWidth.d: Controls the width of the neck opening.
